title: What is more important, computer or internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: If let us select in privacy and security point of you internet is more important 😡 to be frank saying before using internet learn first basic privact issues and internet cyber security how to get use and protect our data from the hacker. overal internet is more important because we can do what ever we want thrrougj internet connection like take full of computer remote connection using internet. control everything as per the requrement. keywords: IoT, AI, ML, Cloud Thanks 😊 @Search KicK

Your question is very good I can complete my answer in short words Firstly computer is important because internet is also a computer . The Internet is the global system of interconnected computer network that uses the (TCP/IP) to link devices worldwide. It is a network of networks that consists of private, public, academic, business, and government networks of local to global scope, linked by a broad array of electronic, wireless, and optical networking technologies.
